data.title: Graham Whittington
data.text:
Graham Whittington represents businesses and individuals in all levels of state and federal courts. He leverages his experience as a federal law clerk to inform his case strategy and assist clients in all stages of litigation.

Honors & Recognitions

Inducted into the James E. and Carolyn B. Davis Society, University of North Carolina School of Law (2019)

Awarded the North Carolina Law Reviewâ€™s Joyner Award for most outstanding staff writing submission (2019)
